ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Biotech Extended
ModMetaData.author: CTH2004, Ferny
ModMetaData.descriptionsByVersion:
<1.5>a mod that is designed with 1 pourpuse: to merge and integrate different biotech mods, based around:
Vanilla Factions Expanded: Ancients Biotech Vanilla Genetics Expanded
or, to quote Progression- Genetics: "Reintegrates genetic technologies for a more cohesive Rimworld."</1.5> <1.4>Well, to quote a better description:
"Reintegrates genetic technologies for a more cohesive Rimworld."
basically, just some patches, so there are no true hard reqriements. The 1.5 version does have some hard reqriments, but not this one! </1.4>
